target_text: "Yes, very important question! Software quality is first and most the product confirms to the requirements and free of defects."

Codebook.Definition: The text emphasizes the significance of software quality, indicating it as a crucial aspect of software development.
This code refers to the idea that software quality is determined by how well the product meets the specified requirements.
The text highlights the necessity for the software to be free of defects as a measure of its quality.
